com.mygdx.pixelworld.data.items

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.pixelworld.data.items.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LockedInventory

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Inventory generalizes an Item array, and is capable of doing basic operations with its item and work with other inventories.
